entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
